title: Crystal echidna
data:
***Version [0.32](/0.32 "0.32")**: This article is up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup*.*

| crystal echidna r [![Crystal echidna.png](/images/0/05/Crystal_echidna.png)](/File:Crystal_echidna.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                          | 42-86                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                                | 10                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                                          | Immune                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Attack1                                                                                                 | 20 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                                 | [rF+++](/Fire "Fire") [rC+++](/Cold "Cold") [rElec+++](/Electricity "Electricity") [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                       | None                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                                           | Land                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |

| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                                        | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                                                                                                                                                                                             |

| Flags                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

|   |                                                                                                                                                        |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A spiny, long snouted rodent grown out of pure living crystal. It is immune to most forms of magic and hurls both crystalline bolts and painful barbs. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Crystal echidnas** are found in the [Iron City of Dis](/Iron_City_of_Dis "Iron City of Dis"). They can fire both barbs and bolts of crystal.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                       |                                                      |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Crystallizing Shot](/Crystallizing_Shot "Crystallizing Shot") (2d19) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Throw Barbs](/Throw_Barbs "Throw Barbs") (2d13)                      | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- By the time you're in [extended](/Extended "Extended"), crystal echidnas shouldn't be much of a threat by themselves. However, they can make you [fragile](/Fragile "Fragile") with their [Crystallizing Shots](/Crystallizing_Shot "Crystallizing Shot").
- Crystal echidnas are susceptible to [LRD](/LRD "LRD") and [Shatter](/Shatter "Shatter").

## History

- Prior to [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), crystal echidnas had [Crystal Bolt](/Crystal_Bolt "Crystal Bolt") instead of [Crystallizing Shot](/Crystallizing_Shot "Crystallizing Shot").
- Crystal echidnas were added in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").
html:
Crystal echidna

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.32: This article is up to date for the latest stable release of Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup.
crystal echidna r 
HP 42-86
HD 12
XP 647
Speed 10
AC 10
EV 10
Will Immune
Attack1 20 (bite: plain)


Resistances rF+++
rC+++
rElec+++
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Non-living
Size Little
Type crystal echidna, crystal echidna
Flags
A spiny, long snouted rodent grown out of pure living crystal. It is immune to most forms of magic and hurls both crystalline bolts and painful barbs.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Crystal echidnas are found in the Iron City of Dis. They can fire both barbs and bolts of crystal.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Crystallizing Shot (2d19) Natural flag
Slot2 Throw Barbs (2d13) Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • By the time you're in extended, crystal echidnas shouldn't be much of a threat by themselves. However, they can make you fragile with their Crystallizing Shots.
  • Crystal echidnas are susceptible to LRD and Shatter.

History

  • Prior to 0.32, crystal echidnas had Crystal Bolt instead of Crystallizing Shot.
  • Crystal echidnas were added in 0.28.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Crystal_echidna&oldid=81211"

rawPage:
{{version032}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Crystal echidnas''' are found in the [[Iron City of Dis]]. They can fire both barbs and bolts of crystal.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*By the time you're in [[extended]], crystal echidnas shouldn't be much of a threat by themselves. However, they can make you [[fragile]] with their [[Crystallizing Shot]]s.
*Crystal echidnas are susceptible to [[LRD]] and [[Shatter]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.32]], crystal echidnas had [[Crystal Bolt]] instead of [[Crystallizing Shot]].
*Crystal echidnas were added in [[0.28]].
